Requirements are covered in other environmental Standards as follows:
(a) ESRS E1 Climate change which addresses the following seven greenhouse gases
connected to air pollution: carbon dioxide (CO2), methane (CH4), nitrous oxide (N2O),
hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), perfluorocarbons (PFCs), sulphur hexafluoride (SF6) and
nitrogen trifluoride (NF3).
